mapper.select: SELECT C.USER_ID, A.OPENSEME_NO, A.OPENSEME_YEAR, A.OPENSEME_SEMESTER , B.LECTURE_CODE, B.LECTURE_CREDIT , D.GRADE_NO, D.AVERAGE FROM OPENSEMESTER A LEFT OUTER JOIN LECTURE B ON(A.OPENSEME_NO = B.OPENSEME_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN ATTEND C ON(B.LECTURE_CODE = C.LECTURE_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN GRADE D ON(C.ATTEND_NO = D.ATTEND_NO) WHERE C.USER_ID = #{user_id} ORDER BY A.OPENSEME_YEAR, A.OPENSEME_SEMESTER ASC
